findings.title: No Maximal Request Size Configured
findings.description: The application does not limit the size of requests that can be received, making it vulnerable to denial of service attacks.

findings.title: Unused Variable Declarations
findings.description: In the `new-escrow` route definition in `src/controller/Stellar.js`, the public key of the sender is derived but never used and the transaction result is obtained but not used.

findings.title: Incorrect Parameter Descriptions in Inline Endpoint Documentation
findings.description: The parameter list in the comments for several endpoints in `src/controller/Stellar.js` seems to have been incorrectly copied and pasted, leading to missing or wrong parameter descriptions.

findings.title: Unused Dependency
findings.description: The `express-formidable` package is imported as a dependency but never used.
